column1: #Text=But I 'm here to close the portal .
#Text=" Vaatu says : " You might want to reconsider - that is if you want to save your friend .
#Text=I ca n't believe I trusted you !
#Text=You made me think you wanted to restore balance with spirits , but this - this is n't balance , it 's madness !
#Text=" Unalaq says : " If you want your friend to make it out of the Spirit World , you 'll open the other portal now .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Do n't do it Korra !
#Text=" Unalaq says : " What will it be ?
#Text=Open the portal - or lose your friend 's soul forever ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " You should 've come through the portal .
#Text=" Vaatu says : " I 'll see you soon , Raava .
#Text=Once the Harmonic Convergence comes , I 'll be free from this prison , and then I will have my revenge !
